title: Israel's FM flies out to US for first Board of Peace summit
desc: Gideon Sa'ar will attend the summit, which is set to begin at 9 a.m. local time (4 p.m. Israel time), at Netanyahu's request following the PM's trip to DC last week.

title: Man jailed for manslaughter of Canadian tourist in Dublin
desc: A man who kicked a Canadian tourist in the head in an assault on O'Connell Street in Dublin in June 2024, has been jailed for five and a half years for manslaughter.

title: Recap, Reaction, and Highlights
desc: For just the second time with National Hockey League players, Team Germany has made the Olympic quarterfinals. They punched their ticket Tuesday morning in a qualification game against France, beating them 5-1 with a one-goal, three-point performance from Leon Draisaitl. title: Should your therapy session be outdoors? More therapists are trying it.
desc: A growing body of research shows that getting outside is good for mood and memory. Some therapists are bringing their practices outdoors to boost the benefits.
